original_title: The Cat in the Hat: Let's Celebrate!
overview: Come one, come all, come Celebrate! With the Cat in the Hat you've got a date! When the Cat eats the last chocolate Nick and Sally must fly to Coco-a-licious to restock their supply. But princess Lotta-Chocka's helpers are away. Can the Cat and the kids help make chocolate today? You bet they can - the best chocolate you've seen! And to make it they start with a small bitter bean.
title: The Cat in the Hat: Let's Celebrate!
